name: Viva Sativa 420 Artist Colab Collection - 2013
description:
VIVA SATIVA in collaboration with PHILTH, ROOTZ ARTWORK, SWOLF & RIKKI MARR are proud to offer their VERY RARE & LIMITED EDITION 420 Artist Colab Range of tee's for 2013...

Limited to just 420 EVER in the World, these exclusive works of PotArt are Hand Printed & Hand Finished here in the Heart of England.  Using only eco friendly water based inks, screen printed on to a 100% Organic Cotton tee.

For fans of the complete collection (ALL FOUR TEE's), we are offering the set at a reduced price of £100.00 - Saving £20.00 off the individual purchase price. You then also have the chance to purchase a SECRET FIFTH TEE... Which is only available to anyone buying the complete set... 

PRICE INCLUDES FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING

name: Viva Head Tee - Full Colour - Olive
description:
Looking even more gorgeous than ever in glorious full colour (4 colour print).. Our "New Range" of Viva Head Tee's are now available...

Designed & Hand printed in England using "waterbased" inks on to a 100% Organic Cotton Tee.. They look & feel yummy & wash great too..

NB: Although one of our "Logo Tee's".. these Tee's are Limited to runs of 20.. & we may change the Tee/print colour each time we run them... so grab 'em while you can... ;-) xx

name: Viva "BIG" Logo Tee - Purple
description:
Our "New Range" of Logo Tee's... 

There are two variants on the same theme.. #1 is "BIG".. say it loud & say it proud... blazened  across the front of your chest.. "Viva Sativa"... & #2 "small"... is, as the name suggest.. a smaller.. more subtle version of our logo tee.. sat neatly on your left hand chest... both designs are available in three different colours options...

Designed & Hand printed in England using "waterbased" inks on to a 100% Organic Cotton Tee.. They look & feel yummy & wash great too..

NB: Although our "Logo Tee's".. these Tee's are Limited to runs of 20 (ish).. & we may change the Tee/print colour each time we run them... so grab 'em while you can... ;-) xx

name: "Casey Jones" Tee - Black
description:
The "Casey Jones" Tee is the 1st Tee in our "Viva Selection" range. The "Viva Selection" being a series of Tee's, Posters, Cards & Prints paying homage to some of our favourite varieties of "Medicinal Marijuana" here at Viva Sativa.

 Hand printed in the Heart of England, in a single colour on to a 155gram, 100% Certified Organic Cotton, "Earth Positive" Tee. We would have ideally used a Hemp Tee (or a Hemp/Cotton mix), but until we can source one with a cut and feel we are happy with, we opted for these gorgeous Tee's, as they tick just about every ethical box possible, whilst looking and feeling fantastic!

These Tee's are available in four sizes; S, M, L & XL

name: Viva Sativa Sticker Pack #1
description:
Finally.. our long awaited stickers are now available to buy...

Due to the popularity of our Philth 4-20 Tee's (long since sold out.. only 20 EVER in the World..)... we have decided to run both designs as yummy scrummy (screen printed) vinyl stickers...

Each pack contains FIVE STICKERS..

1 x Philth 4-20 #1 (Bong Gurl) sticker.. large (110mm x 150mm)
2 x Philth 4-20 #1 (Bong Gurl) sticker's.. small (55mm x 75mm)
2 x Philth 4-20 #2 (Wake & Bake) sticker's.. 80mm diameter

name: Viva Notepad #2
description: A 144mm x 144mm square spiral bound notepad, with 96 blank pages inside....

name: Happy Birthday Bud #3 Greetings Card
description: Printed in a glorious full-colour process on to a 280 gram FSC accredited Artboard. The cards measure a traditional 5" x 7" (127mm x 177mm) greetings card size and are left blank inside for your own greeting.  Celo wrapped, they come complete with a gummed Manila envelope.

name: Viva Head Greetings Card
description:
She's so beautiful, we just had do offer her as a "Greetings Card" to send to all your Bredrin's and Free Thinking Herbalist's out there; our Company Mascot and inspiration - the Goddess "Viva Sativa"!

Printed in a glorious full-colour process on to a 280 gram FSC accredited Artboard. The cards measure a traditional 5" x 7" (127mm x 177mm) greetings card size and are left blank inside for your own greeting.  Celo wrapped, they come complete with a gummed Manila envelope.

name: Merry Christmas Bud #1 Christmas Card
description:
The 1st in our now World famous "Merry Christmas Bud" series of Christmas cards.

Well what can we say...the photo shoot was so much fun! And with over 20 varieties to take pictures of, we kinda got confused as to which was which. So rather than guess, we decided just to call them "Merry Christmas Bud" number's 1-6. However, the selection did include some of our favourites here at Viva Sativa, such as the "Casey Jones", "OG Kush", "Amnesia Haze", "ChemDawg", "Island Sweet Skunk" & "Super Silver Sour Diesel Haze", to name but a few!

A traditional 5" x 7" (127mm x 177mm) sized greetings card, printed in glorious full-colour on to a 280 gram FSC accredited Artboard.  The cards are left blank inside for your own greeting and come in a Celo wrap, complete with a gummed Manila envelope.

 Hand printed in the Heart of England, in a single colour on to a 155gram, 100% Certified Organic Cotton, "Earth Positive" Tee. We would have ideally used a Hemp Tee (or a Hemp/Cotton mix), but until we can source one with a cut and feel we are happy with, we opted for these gorgeous Tee's, as they tick just about every ethical box possible, whilst looking and feeling fantastic!

These Tee's are available in four sizes; S, M, L & XL

name: Viva Head Women's Tee - Green
description:
Looking as beautiful as she does, we just had to put her on our 1st Tee! The Goddess "Viva Sativa". Our company mascot and inspiration!

Hand printed in five glorious colours on to a super sexy 70/30% Bamboo/Organic cotton mix 150gram Tee. These Tee's tick too many ethical boxes to mention and the fabric feels like no other! Helps keep you cool in the summer and warm in the winter.

A little more feminine in it's cut than the Men's Tee's...

Available in three sizes; S, M & L

name: Viva Bobble Hat
description:
For all you "Free Thinking Herbalist's" out there. Keep your head warm in winter with this stylish Wool/Fleece lined Bobble Hat.

Available in Black only.

One size fits all.

name: Viva Urban Commando Cap - Khaki
description:
For all "Free Thinking Herbalist's" & "Urban Commando's" everywhere. A stylish & funky linen cap, with discreet Viva label.

Available in two sizes; small/medium, large/extra-large

name: Viva Notepad #1
description: A6 spiral bound notepad. 96 blank pages.

name: Happy Birthday Bud #1 Greetings Card
description: Printed in a glorious full-colour process on to a 280 gram FSC accredited Artboard. The cards measure a traditional 5" x 7" (127mm x 177mm) greetings card size and are left blank inside for your own greeting.  Celo wrapped, they come complete with a gummed Manila envelope.

name: Happy Birthday Bud #2 Greetings Card
description: Printed in a glorious full-colour process on to a 280 gram FSC accredited Artboard. The cards measure a traditional 5" x 7" (127mm x 177mm) greetings card size and are left blank inside for your own greeting.  Celo wrapped, they come complete with a gummed Manila envelope.

name: Viva Head A6 Postcard
description:
She's so beautiful, we just had do offer her as a "Postcard" to send to all your Bredrin's and Free Thinking Herbalist's out there; our Company Mascot and inspiration - the Goddess "Viva Sativa"!

Printed in a glorious full-colour process on to a 280 gram FSC accredited Artboard. The Postcards are a traditional 4" x 6" (105mm x 150mm) size, with an area on the back for your own message.
